fields.name: ChildResources
fields.description: List of resources in this virtual cluster.

fields.name: Family
fields.description: If the service has different generations of hardware, for the same SKU, then that can be captured here.

fields.name: MaintenanceConfigurationId
fields.description: Specifies maintenance configuration id to apply to this virtual cluster.

fields.name: SubnetId
fields.description: Subnet resource ID for the virtual cluster.
